name: Snacky Frog Remix
description:
If you can beat all 12 levels feel free to share your best total time score! :D

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrows to move
  • Left Mouse Button - to eat fly
  • R - quick restart
  • ESC - return to menu

Decided to experiment with snacky frog from last years frog mini jam for this years frog 2 mini jam! :D 

Reused a bunch of art and music and code that i made for the original version.  Made using gms 2 and pyxel edit.  Art, music, and programming by Chase of Bass
